Welcome to the reference manual for pairedGSEA!
This manual will guide you through how to use the main functions of pairedGSEA.



### Install pairedGSEA
```{r install, eval = FALSE}
devtools::install_github("biosurf/pairedGSEA")
```



```{r setup}
library(pairedGSEA)
```
